bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign of a painful sensation brought forth by an accumulation of cold, heat, blood, qi, phlegm, or water in the body. Shen nong ben cao jing 神農本草經 Substance Entry fu ling 茯苓：主胸脅逆氣，憂恚驚邪 恐悸，心下結痛 , “It controls qi moving contrary to its regular direction in chest and flanks, palpitation resulting from worrying, rage, fright, and fear, as well as nodes with pain below the heart”.
